text: Eduardo Menichetti Pilas (1950/51 - 8 July 2007) was a Chilean businessman from Santiago. He was best known as the president of the football club Colo- Colo from 1990 to 1995. During his five-year tenure, the club won three Campeonato Nacional titles and three international titles. Menichetti died from colorectal cancer on 8 July 2007 at the age of 56. His two children survived him. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2007 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Chile Category:Businesspeople from Santiago
title: Eduardo Menichetti
